title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 122 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 122 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.
lineList.cn: （大卫上行之诗）人对我说，我们往耶和华的殿去，我就欢喜。

lineList.en: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
lineList.cn: 耶路撒冷阿，我们的脚站在你的门内。

lineList.en: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
lineList.cn: 耶路撒冷被建造，如同连络整齐的一座城。

lineList.en: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.
lineList.cn: 众支派，就是耶和华的支派，上那里去，按以色列的常例（或作作以色列的证据）称赞耶和华的名。

lineList.en: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.
lineList.cn: 因为在那里设立审判的宝座，就是大卫家的宝座。

lineList.en: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.
lineList.cn: 你们要为耶路撒冷求平安。耶路撒冷阿，爱你的人必然兴旺。

lineList.en: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
lineList.cn: 愿你城中平安，愿你宫内兴旺。

lineList.en: For my brethren and companions' sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
lineList.cn: 因我弟兄和同伴的缘故，我要说，愿平安在你中间。

lineList.en: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
lineList.cn: 因耶和华我们神殿的缘故，我要为你求福。
